name: Calculatrons
description:
Make the machines count for you.

Made for Unreal Engine Summer Jam 2019.


Instructions:

  1. Press SPACE to start and stop the game. 
  2. Click on tiles to make waypoints. 
  3. Click and hold on waypoints to change directions. 
  4. Tiles need their content to match the target (number above them).

Credits: 

  1. Font by https://kenney.nl/
  2. Sounds by http://getsoundly.com/
  3. Everything else by me.
